about_the_game: Fight as one of Julius Caesar's greatest warriors with the Roman Centurion Pack. Donning the lion pelt of Rome's fiercest soldiers, complete your exclusive gear set with 2 weapons, 1 shield, and 1 mount.
detailed_description: Fight as one of Julius Caesar's greatest warriors with the Roman Centurion Pack. Donning the lion pelt of Rome's fiercest soldiers, complete your exclusive gear set with 2 weapons, 1 shield, and 1 mount.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400s @ 2.5 GHz or AMD FX-6350 @ 3.9 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270 (2048 MB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 42 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Video Preset: Lowest (720p)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 280X (3GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • Storage: 42 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Video Preset: High (1080p)

short_description: Fight as one of Julius Caesar's greatest warriors with the Roman Centurion Pack. Donning the lion pelt of Rome's fiercest soldiers, complete your exclusive gear set with 2 weapons, 1 shield, and 1 mount.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
